titles.title: 21st Century Federal Writersâ€™ Project Act
21st Century Federal Writersâ€™ Project Act
To establish a grant program in the Department of Labor to assist unemployed and under-employed workers to document the American experience.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
